name: send_gift
attributes: # [doc = " NFT をギフトし、手数料を徴収するが、"]
# [doc = " gift_account.owner と ctx.accounts.sender.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let gift_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . gift_account ;
let fee = ctx . accounts . config . gift_fee ;
* * ctx . accounts . sender . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= fee ;
* * ctx . accounts . fee_pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += fee ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . sender_nft . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . recipient_nft . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . sender . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

fields.name: gift_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を付けて"] # [doc = " gift_account.owner と sender.key() を照合すべき"]

fields.name: fee_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 徴収した手数料を貯めるプール"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: sender
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ギフトを送るユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: sender_nft
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 送信者の NFT トークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: recipient_nft
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 受取人の NFT トークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: token_program
fields.attribute: # [doc = " SPL トークンプログラム"]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ギフト手数料設定を保持するアカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このギフト機能を操作できるべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: last_note
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 最後に添えられたメモ"]

fields.name: gift_fee
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 1 回のギフト送信につき徴収する手数料（Lamports）"]
